Breath Weapon (Cold).name: Breath Weapon (Cold)
Breath Weapon (Cold).description: You gain a breath weapon that deals @Damage[15d6[cold]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] and takes 2 actions to activate. After you use your breath weapon you cannot use it again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

Breath Weapon (Fire).name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
Breath Weapon (Fire).description: Your breath weapon deals @Damage[15d6[fire]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] and takes 2 actions to activate. The damage is either cold or fire damage, determined at random when you use your Furious Concoction. After you use your breath weapon you cannot use it again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

Effect: Billowing Orifice.name: Effect: Billowing Orifice
Effect: Billowing Orifice.description:
Flesh Manifestation Raging Effect Traits Damage
Billowing Orifice You take a –1 status penalty against Fortitude saves that would give you the sickened condition. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against poison. Inhaled, Poison Poison

Effect: Breath Weapon (Cold).name: Effect: Breath Weapon (Cold)
Effect: Breath Weapon (Cold).description: You gain a breath weapon that deals @Damage[15d6[cold]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] and takes 2 actions to activate. After you use your breath weapon you cannot use it again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

Effect: Breath Weapon (Fire).name: Effect: Breath Weapon (Fire)
Effect: Breath Weapon (Fire).description: You gain a breath weapon that deals @Damage[15d6[fire]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] and takes 2 actions to activate. The damage is either cold or fire damage, determined at random when you use your Furious Concoction. After you use your breath weapon you cannot use it again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

Effect: Broken Body.name: Effect: Broken Body
Effect: Broken Body.description: Broken Body The first time you are critically hit, you suffer a strange injury and your penalty to AC while raging increases by 1

Effect: Companion Rage.name: Effect: Companion Rage
Effect: Companion Rage.description:
Your animal companion gains the Rage action with the same benefits as your Rage. The first time you give your animal companion commands during your Rage, it can use its Rage as a free action before it spends its actions for the turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

Effect: Die Another Day.name: Effect: Die Another Day
Effect: Die Another Day.description: When your fury expires, and your wounds seethe, they fuel in ways your anger could not keeping you going despite perilous wounds. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against death effects and a status bonus to damage equal to twice your wounded condition. While you regret, you can spend a single action with the concentrate trait to counteract an ongoing mental effect you are suffering from or your doomed condition. Your counteract level for this attempt is equal to half your level rounded up, and you use your Will save bonus for the counteract check.

Effect: Extra Limbs.name: Effect: Extra Limbs
Effect: Extra Limbs.description: Gain an extra set of arms that help you attack. Your multiple attack penalty on all attacks is -3 or (-2 if agile) on your second attack, or -6 (-4 if agile) on your third or subsequent attacks.

Effect: Forever Furious.name: Effect: Forever Furious
Effect: Forever Furious.description: You can use class feats and abilities that would normally require you to be raging so long as those abilities would not normally end your Rage or give you the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} condition. When you do so, you gain the additional damage from your Rage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Frenzied Rage.name: Effect: Frenzied Rage
Effect: Frenzied Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.barbarians.barbarians-features.gB6Y9LKNgazyV5M9]{Fury Instinct+}

When you use an action with the Rage trait, you briefly enter a frenzied state, making you more dangerous but leaving you open to attack. You increase your additional damage from Rage from 2 to 6 and become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Invigorating Speech.name: Effect: Invigorating Speech
Effect: Invigorating Speech.description: They also gain a +2 status bonus to saves against death and fear effects for the next hour.

Effect: Lingering Fury.name: Effect: Lingering Fury
Effect: Lingering Fury.description: When your rage fades, you still find the means to muster your strength through the wrath that still lingers at the back of your mind. You gain half your additional damage from Rage to Strikes that would normally apply your additional damage while raging. While you regret, you can use an action or activity with the Rage trait even though you are not raging, but doing so ends your Lingering Fury and you can't use this action again for 10 minutes. You cannot use an action with the Rage trait if using that action would normally end your Rage or give you the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} condition.

Effect: Massive Growth.name: Effect: Massive Growth
Effect: Massive Growth.description: Grow to size Huge, increasing your reach by 10 feet (if you were medium or smaller) and gaining the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} condition.

Effect: Miserable.name: Effect: Miserable
Effect: Miserable.description: If you take damage, you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves against mental effects and you ignore the –1 penalty to AC from Rage until the beginning of your next turn (though you would still take any other penalties, such as a giant instinct barbarian's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}).

Effect: Percussive Maintenance.name: Effect: Percussive Maintenance
Effect: Percussive Maintenance.description: If you hit, you deal damage as normal for your unarmed Strike and the target takes a –1 status penalty to AC and reduces its Hardness by half your level until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Quick Swig.name: Effect: Quick Swig
Effect: Quick Swig.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.barbarians.barbarians-feats.3S7kMHBommqKagFb]{Quick Swig}

If the liquid was an alcohol, you may choose to get an automatic failure on your saving throw to gain a +10-foot status bonus to your speed and +2 status bonus to damage for 2 rounds. Consuming alcohol in this way removes the onset period. The status bonus to damage increases to +3 if you are 7th level, or +5 if you are 15th level.

Effect: Scrambled Cells.name: Effect: Scrambled Cells
Effect: Scrambled Cells.description: You restore half as many Hit Points from spells or items with the healing trait for 1 day.

Effect: Spirit Empathy.name: Effect: Spirit Empathy
Effect: Spirit Empathy.description: You have the uncanny knack for reaching out to the spirits around you. For 1 hour, you can use the Investigate and Search activities with a +1 status bonus as spirits nearby aid you in your endeavor. If during your activity you discover a spirit or haunt, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Initiative check.

Effect: Steel Skin.name: Effect: Steel Skin
Effect: Steel Skin.description: You gain resistance to all damage equal to your raging resistance.

Effect: Titanic Rage.name: Effect: Titanic Rage
Effect: Titanic Rage.description:
You overexert yourself with a monstrous rage that changes you from person to avatar of fury. You Rage with the following modifications:

  • Your rage lasts 5 rounds rather than 1 minute.
  • You take a –1 penalty to saving throws or a –2 penalty if it is a death effect.
  • You double the normal additional damage from your rage, including extra damage from your instinct.
  • Increase the penalty to your AC from Rage by 1.
  • You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} for 1 hour after you finish raging.

Effect: Tongue Proboscis.name: Effect: Tongue Proboscis
Effect: Tongue Proboscis.description:
Flesh Manifestation Raging Effect Traits Damage
Tongue Proboscis Fortitude saves you make to remove the sickened condition take a –2 status penalty. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against olfactory effects or diseases. Manipulate Bleed

Effect: Unblinkiing Eyes.name: Effect: Unblinkiing Eyes
Effect: Unblinkiing Eyes.description:
Flesh Manifestation Raging Effect Traits Damage
Unblinkiing Eyes You take a –1 status penalty against
visual effects. You gain a +1 status
bonus to Perception checks to Seek.		 Mental, Visual Mental

Effect: Volatile Rage.name: Effect: Volatile Rage
Effect: Volatile Rage.description: Your additional Rage damage is of the type of damage your bomb would deal, you gain resistance of half your level to that damage type, and your appearance shifts as if you had consumed a mutagen.

Effect: Warp Spasm.name: Effect: Warp Spasm
Effect: Warp Spasm.description:
Flesh Manifestation Raging Effect Traits Damage
Warp Spasm You take a –1 status penalty to Acrobatics and Reflex saves. You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics. Manipulate Bludgeoning

Stance: Destined Kill.name: Stance: Destined Kill
Stance: Destined Kill.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.barbarians.barbarians-feats.yLRgM8jZdHMBQSgv]{Destined Kill}

You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated} by the target. You take a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than the target of your stance. Your additional damage from Rage increases by 4 against them and is reduced by 4 against all other creatures. If you have greater weapon specialization, alter the amount of additional damage that is increased and reduced to 6. You gain your raging resistance against all damage dealt to you from creatures that are not the target of your stance.
